ActJudges Act
SubjectMarie Legg ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Hugh P. Legg
PrecisGranting of an annuity to MARIE LEGG, widow of the Honourable Hugh P. Legg, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective February 28, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
